text: Safi Airways Co. () is an Afghan airline. The airline Safi Airways - IATA-Code 4Q - was started in 2006 by Rahim Safi, an Afghan Businessman. This private airline has its head office in the Safi Airline Center in Shahr-e-Naw, Kabul and an administrative office in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. ==References== == Other websites == Safi Airways Official Website Category:Airlines of Asia Category:Kabul
title: Safi Airways
